DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigation determine value combine acupuncture infertility patient undergo In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) . The investigator measure outcomes endometrial lining , uterine blood flow , hormone , stress level , pregnancy live birth rate .
DOC.brief_title: In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Acupuncture Infertility
DOC.criteria: female 21 42 year old primary secondary infertility 2 previously fail IVF cycle undergo IVF FSH < 11 FSH > 11 use egg donor use PGD use heparin lovanox protocol estradiol level less 20 80 take herbal therapy
